title: Increases tax on alcohol; creates the Alcoholism and Substance Abuse Treatment Fund
summary: Increases tax on alcohol; creates the Alcoholism and Substance Abuse Treatment Fund; requires an annual report on the spending and allocation of the fund; establishes a task force for the Alcoholism and Substance Abuse Treatment Fund consisting of 15 members.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the tax on alcohol; to amend the state finance law, in relation to creating the alcoholism and substance abuse prevention and treatment fund; and to require an annual report and a task force for the alcoholism and substance abuse prevention and treatment fund
